column4: hello everyone, is there a way to change the mnemonic (accel key) of an item in the gnome/nautilus's context menu ?
ok you've asked enough, I'll bite - what is a mnemonic or accel key?
:) mnemonic is the letter with a little line beneath it so you can press that letter on the keyboard in order to access that item
these are localization dependant, i mean you change gnome's language, they change too
